analysis.description:
CryptoSportsToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/31/0x0ff1dbacdb27e47a43520c05885dd8bbe165333a.sol#112-113) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x0ff1dbacdb27e47a43520c05885dd8bbe165333a.sol#221-233)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x0ff1dbacdb27e47a43520c05885dd8bbe165333a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x0ff1dbacdb27e47a43520c05885dd8bbe165333a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x0ff1dbacdb27e47a43520c05885dd8bbe165333a.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
